title: Creative Frontend Developer
description: I'm passionate about building simple but creative solutions either with no-code platforms like Webflow or from scratch in Next.js, React and Typescript (or Vue.js and Nuxt.js) while using CMS like Contentful to ensure control over the content by the client. I make sure to document all the development process to ensure high transparency for the client. Hit me up if you're in need of a new website or more complex web solutions. I have also experience in working with Figma and I'm excited to design websites from scratch.
